name: Escape! (itch) (Poop Dollar)
description:
Escape the insects in the Jungle! Use Arrow keys to move and Z to shoot. Don't let the bugs touch you and try to survive as long as possible. Can you escape the jungle?

This game was made in part for a 3 hour game jam.

It took 3 hours and 10 minutes exactly to create.

All assets are made from scratch using Pico8

Rate my game! https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152/rate/1356344

I hope you enjoy!
